# notation

| symbol | meaning | latex
|--------|---------|-----------
| $\neg$ | not     | `\neg`
| $\forall$ | all     | `\forall`
| $\exists$ | some | `\exists`
| $\cup$ | union, "or" | `\cup`
| $\cap$ | intersection, "and" | `\cap`
| $\mid$ | given, conditional on | `\mid`, `|`
| $\sum$ | sum | `\sum`
| $\prod$ | product | `\prod`
